newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin down five cents at 14.22 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin down five cents at 14.22 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell five cents to 14.22 ringgit ($5.74) a kg as the closure of the London Metal Exchange (LME) for Easter caused players to square positions, traders said.

"There was continued consolidation as the LME was closed," said a Malaysian trader. "There should be some indicators again for the market when the LME opens tonight. There were 75 tonnes on offer, against bids for 110. Final turnover was 100 tonnes against 57 tonnes on Monday. Buyers were European, Japanese and locals. Local price was at a premium of $30 against London, from $45 on Monday.- K. Baranee Krishnaan(603-2307509)($1=2.4790)
